survey_name: Digital Wallet Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user experiences, preferences, and satisfaction levels with digital wallet services.

questions.question_text: Which digital wallet services have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow respondents to select all applicable options. Include an 'Other' field with a text box for additional entries.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional entries.

script.question_text: Which digital wallet services have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use digital wallet services for payments?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected at least one digital wallet in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format. Consider grouping responses into ranges for easier analysis.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Ensure this question is only shown to respondents who selected at least one option in Q1.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use digital wallet services for payments?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected at least one digital wallet in Q1

questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field.

script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected at least one digital wallet in Q1

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your primary digital wallet service? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected at least one digital wallet in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Display as a 5-point Likert scale.

script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected at least one digital wallet in Q1

questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with a maximum of 3 selections allowed. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field.

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any security concerns or issues with digital wallet services?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected at least one digital wallet in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format. Include a 'Prefer not to say' option for sensitive topics.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any security concerns or issues with digital wallet services?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected at least one digital wallet in Q1

questions.question_text: Please describe any security concerns or issues you have experienced with digital wallet services.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only to respondents who answered 'Yes' to Q6
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field for detailed responses. Ensure the field is large enough to accommodate longer answers.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text. Only show this question if Q6 was answered with 'Yes'.

script.question_text: Please describe any security concerns or issues you have experienced with digital wallet services.
script.routing_logic: Appears only to respondents who answered 'Yes' to Q6

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your primary digital wallet service to a friend or colleague? (0 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected at least one digital wallet in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a numeric scale from 0 to 10 for Net Promoter Score (NPS) calculation. Label the endpoints clearly.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Display as an 11-point numeric scale.
